metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45473 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In MediaWiki through 1.37, Wikibase item descriptions allow XSS, which is triggered upon a visit to an action=info URL (aka a page-information sidebar).

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
